value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Happy Day of Devotion, Anthiese!
This is for you.$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Oh, thank you, Conrad!$k$pOh my... These were my favorite
sweets when I was a child. You
remembered that all this time?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|How could I forget? I poured my
heart and soul into making them.
I wanted them perfect.$k$pI hope they're good. Shall we...try
some? Oh, what am I thinking—we
need some tea! Wait right here.$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|That's fi—hey, wait! Oh, my dear
brother... Always busying yourself
with something.$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|...$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Oh! Hello, Alm. Is something the
matter? You have a look about you...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|I was just thinking how lucky you
are...to have such a caring older
brother, I mean.$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|I see...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|At times like these, I can't help but
reflect on the deaths of both Berkut
and Emperor Rudolf...$k$pAnd how painful it is to be left alone,
the last of my kin.$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Hm... I understand why you feel that
way, but this world is different. You
met Prince Berkut here, didn't you?$k$pWho's to say the same can't happen
with Emperor Rudolf?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|Alm... My son.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|E-Emperor Rudolf?! Th-this...this...
How could— What are you—$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|By the goddess! What was I just
saying, Alm? It's a Day of Devotion
wish come true!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|I, uh...I'm not sure what to say...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|Here. This is for you.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|I don't understand. What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|I am told people give their loved ones
gifts during the Day of Devotion. So,
this gift is for you.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Oh! R-right! Of course...$k$pEr, thank you, E-Emperor Rudol—
Fath— Your Excellency...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|You are most welcome. Now, I must
find Berkut. He's sure to be offended
if others are getting gifts before him...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Oh...right... Er, hey—wait!$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|He certainly is a man of singular
focus. Are you going after him?$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|Ugh, I haven't changed a bit...$k$pEven with him right here in front
of me, I still couldn't say the things
I want to tell him...$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|What matters is that he's here.
You don't need to rush. Take all
the time you need.$k$pYou are father and son. He will
surely understand if you speak
from your heart.$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|Hm. I suppose you're right. I will
keep trying. Thank you, Celica.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Look at these heart-shaped candies!
Which do you think Alm would like
most, the pink ones or the red ones?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Tough to say... The ones shaped like
bunnies are cute too. And the ones
shaped like flowers as well... Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Faye! Our opponents have arrived!$k$pWait... Conrad? What are you doing
here? Faye and I were just doing
some shopping...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Ah! Well, I overheard you talking
about a shop with cute candies, and
I just had to see them for myself!$k$pNow, which of these would be the
most perfect gift for Anthiese...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Shopping will have wait. We have
opponents to face!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Phew... What a day. We got quite
a bit of shopping done, didn't we?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Yes! I had a blast! Hang on... I don't
think I've gone into that shop yet...
Let's take a look!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Slow down, you two! ...Hey!$k$p...Faye! Conraaaad!$k$p$Sbs150|
